properties.description: Initial distance between the element and its parent node border
properties.name: _initOffset

properties.description: Distance between the element and its parent node border
properties.name: _offset

properties.description: Update the sticky positioning when called
properties.name: _setPositionFn

properties.description: Distance between the element and the viewport limits
properties.name: _viewPosition

properties.description: Scrolling breakpoint where the animation is triggered from
properties.name: animPosition

properties.description: Sticky position type         Values: top, bottom, right, left         Default: top
properties.name: side

properties.description: Margin between the sticky and the document limit
properties.name: spacing

properties.description: Sticky type         Values: fixed, absolute         Default: fixed
properties.name: type

properties.description: Quick access to the sticky wrapper element
properties.name: wrapper

methods.description: Check the animation start position and handle it
methods.name: _animationMonitor

methods.description: Set fixed behaviour for bottom and right sticky
methods.name: _bottomRightFixing

methods.description: Get the distance in pixels between the element and its parent border
methods.name: _getOffsetProp

methods.description: Set fixed behaviour inside native scroll container
methods.name: _nativeCompatible

methods.description: Set fixed behaviour for top and left sticky
methods.name: _topLeftFixing

methods.description: Set fixed behaviour inside vc-scroll container
methods.name: _vcScrollCompatible

methods.description: Recalculate sticky wrapper size amd update its position
methods.name: refresh
